title: Respiratory Therapy Clinical Simulation: Managerial Leadership Education with a Sociocultural Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic respiratory therapy theory and over five years of clinical experience
context.additional_context: Enhances social interaction-centered simulation design capabilities for medical device manufacturers/hospital administrators

learning_goals: Learners can promote collaborative learning among team members by designing simulation scenarios reflecting sociocultural contexts
Learners can prioritize learning objective alignment over technology-centric fidelity in respiratory therapy simulations
Learners can develop simulation-based education programs reflecting real clinical scenarios through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
